name: Sprout Quest
description:
You are a sprout. You want to grow into a tree.

Chompers want to eat you before you grow into a tree! Collect Sun in order to get a random upgrade for yourself, and combat the Chompers. Once you collect enough Sun, you will grow into the tree you always wanted to be!

A small game made for My First Game Jam. It's my first released project, so I hope it's at least sort of fun. If there's any bugs, post it in the comments.
